FuncDef: The display nat64 instance command displays the configuration of a specified or all NAT64 instances.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the configuration of a specified NAT64 instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: nat64 alarm port-number log user enable
nat64 alarm port-number trap user enable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the configuration of a NAT64 instance, run the display nat64 instance command. To view the configuration of a specified NAT64 instance, specify instance-name. If this parameter is not configured, the configurations of all NAT64 instances are displayed.
Prerequisites
Basic NAT64 instance functions have been configured.
